sentences.en: Close to the investigation department of the foregoing are very sure that.
sentences.cn: 前述接近调查部门的人士非常肯定地说.

sentences.en: I will now briefly recapitulate the foregoing cases.
sentences.cn: 我现在将上述各项事实,扼要地重述一遍.

sentences.en: The foregoing analysis relates to very wide bearing only.
sentences.cn: 上述分析只适用于很宽的轴承.

sentences.en: The foregoing analysis shows that we are right.
sentences.cn: 以上的分析表明我们是对的.

sentences.en: The foregoing are only a few of the instances.
sentences.cn: 上面所述不过是少数的例子.

sentences.en: The foregoing considerations may be concluded in a few words.
sentences.cn: 上述各种考虑可以用几句话来归纳一下.

sentences.en: The foregoing considerations may be summed up in a few words.
sentences.cn: 上述各种考虑可以用几句话概括起来.

sentences.en: The foregoing examples illustrate this point.
sentences.cn: 上述例证阐明了这个观点。

sentences.en: The foregoing examples suggest some advantages of the finite element method.
sentences.cn: 从上述例子可看出有限单元方法的某些优点.

sentences.en: The foregoing helps to explain these results.
sentences.cn: 前面所说的可以解释这些结果。

sentences.en: The foregoing paragraphs have focused on the feasibility of individual sources complying with emission limitations.
sentences.cn: 前部分集中在个别污染源遵守排放限制的可行性问题上.

sentences.en: The foregoing paragraphs were written in 1985.
sentences.cn: 前面的几个段落写于1985年。

sentences.en: This point has been made clear in the foregoing chapter.
sentences.cn: 这一点在前面那一章中已讲清楚了.

sentences.en: To illustrate the foregoing analysis, consider a linear elestic solid.
sentences.cn: 为了举例阐明以上的分析, 我们考虑一种线性的弹性固体.

sentences.en: Two other leading decisions on CERCLA are in agreement with Monsanto on the foregoing issues.
sentences.cn: 关于《综合性环境反应、赔偿与责任法案》的另外两个主要案例与前述的“蒙萨托”案中问题一致.

sentences.en: We feel that the foregoing analysis is deceptive and dangerous.
sentences.cn: 我们认为上述的分析是靠不住的,也是危险的.

sentences.en: You might think from the foregoing that the French want to phase accents out. Not at all.
sentences.cn: 根据前文所述，你们可能以为法国人打算废除各种口音。事实并非如此。

words.tran_cn: 过去的；先前的；预知的；预先决定的
发生在…之前（forego的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 在前的，在先的，前面提到的
trans.tran_en: something that has just been mentioned, read, dealt with etc

trans.tran_cn: （在位置时间或程度方面）走在…之前，居先( forego的现在分词 )
